about_the_game:
Project Spatial is a new way to capture & share volumetric VR videos from your favorite games.

You can step inside gaming volumetric videos made by your favorite creators and experience content in new, immersive ways.

Project Spatial makes volumetric video creation accessible to all, so seatbelts ON as we soar into uncharted dimensions of shared storytelling only possible through pioneering technologies like VR.

The future of gaming video starts now!

Key features:
  • Watching short gaming videos from any angle, you're in full control of what you want to see
  • Volumetric videos in an overlay so you can view them while playing other games
  • Record your VR gameplay volumetrically giving 6DOF of engagement
  • Anyone can record and share their gaming experiences

We're always looking to add more game support so let us know what games you want to see added.

Join our Discord to provide feedback

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Latest Intel® i7 / Ryzen or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Latest Intel® i7 / Ryzen or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus PC or OpenXR

short_description: Project Spatial is the destination for creating and watching interactive, truly spatial gaming videos. Try out the Pre-Alpha App and see the evolution of video.
